title: Codectra
author: Codectra
content: About UsCodectra is an IDE (Integrated Development Environment) system created to create easy, fast, next-generation, and reliable smart contracts using Solidity and Web 3.0 infrastructures. Unlike other IDE systems, developers can write smart contracts with shortcut codes and provide CTRA gains in every written contract infrastructure.Establishment PurposeThe main problem that arises when developing crypto money technology is considered is understanding and creating smart contracts. The Codectra project is designed to find and solve problems for developers as a new idea for recognizing and creating smart contracts.Our VisionThe vision of the Codectra project is to be the only and most important IDE system that comes to mind in smart contract development and that blockchain infrastructure developers care about.Our MissionThe mission principle of the Codectra project is to fulfill all the road steps created in this process transparently and reliably, to give importance to the thoughts and wishes of the community, to give importance to the team in a fully dependent manner, to create strategic plans in an accurate and accessible way.Development and AccessThanks to thousands of different functions in the Codectra library, your smart contracts can be continuously developed and adapted to technology.Profile InteractionThe smart contracts you have created remain registered to your profile. You can access your contracts even if time passes by keeping them public or private.Fast Coding PossibilityThe smart contract you want to create can be created in minutes thanks to the Codectra library and IDE system.Codectra Remix IDEMeet our smart contract Remix IDE system, which is equipped with next-generation technology, and works based on the use of shortened code and the Codectra library. Develop unconventional, standard, yield farm, staking, lock-lp, token-lp, and smart contracts. Run your smart contracts professionally created with Solidity infrastructure in harmony with DApp programs.Buy CTRA TokenThe Codectra project has a BEP20 token created using the Binance Smart Chain network. The symbol of the created Codectra token is indicated as CTRA and its decimal value is 9. It can be found as CTRA on platforms that support the BSC network.Codectra project is a newly opened project and it aims to provide more advanced and improved services by serving blockchain technologies. You can purchase CTRA Tokens to support the Codectra project and grow with the Codectra community.Contract Address: 0x4f371fc745032833fd674719e3dbb508d0229415Name: CodectraSymbol: CTRAChain: BSC (BEP20)Total Supply: 360.000.000.000 CTRATotal Fee: 3%Slippage: 0.5% - 4%A total of 3% is accounted for in CTRA Token trading. To make this package taken from you to expand their marketing and project liquidity pool. The 2% commission package is forwarded to our marketing. A liquidity commission of 1% is automatically included in the Cake-LP pool.Lock-LPThe WBNB/CTRA matching Cake-LP token created for the CTRA Token has been locked for 1 month. 7 days before unlocking, the liquidity period will gradually continue to be unlocked as 3 months - 6 months - 12 months. Lockdown is provided via DxSale.APP.https://dxsale.app/app/v3_3/dxlockview?id=0&add=0x62e7B18aBB6D0bA297FF36feBF1b4fa7bE92229C&type=lplock&chain=BSChttps://codectra.com/token

comments.author: ololajulo
comments.body: You should be able to provide more information about how to research the project aside from all post here. The twitter page is very young and inactive, 1 post 21 minutes ago is not convincing for new traders. They need to do more to attract more partners and influencers to prove the project is genuine and can survive the crypto market. New project in the bear will need to present a roadmap that the community can follow to bring confidence for adoption.

comments.author: AmoreJaz
comments.body: Quote from: ololajulo on July 19, 2022, 10:21:53 PMYou should be able to provide more information about how to research the project aside from all post here. The twitter page is very young and inactive, 1 post 21 minutes ago is not convincing for new traders. They need to do more to attract more partners and influencers to prove the project is genuine and can survive the crypto market. New project in the bear will need to present a roadmap that the community can follow to bring confidence for adoption.this period, would be difficult to raise money via crowdsourcing methods. if they are indeed serious to pursue this project, they will pitch this to potential private investors. if they do believe that this platform will be a game-changer, it won't be too difficult to convince these wealthy individuals or groups to invest on this project.
